TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EmptyControlCollection extends System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

summary.span: 对始终为空白的 集合提供标准支持。

span.span: Provides standard support for a collection that is always empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你想要定义不允许子控件的自定义控件时，使用此类。This class is used when you want to define a custom control that does not allow child controls. ## Examples [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection/CS/emptycontrolcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection/VB/emptycontrolcollection.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.Control owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: 将此集合作为其子控件集合拥有的 。

span.span: The that owns this collection as its collection of child controls.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的代码示例尝试来填充带有子控件，会导致异常的控件。The following code example attempts to populate a control with child controls, causing an exception. 这是因为容器控件不允许子控件。This is because the container control does not allow child controls. 下面是用来生成可执行文件的命令行。The following is the command line used to build the executable. ```vb vbc /r:System.dll /r:System.Web.dll /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/bin/vb_myEmptyControlCollection.dll myEmptyControlCollection.vb ``` ```csharp csc /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/bin/cs_myEmptyControlCollection.dll myEmptyControlCollection.cs ``` [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection/CS/emptycontrolcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_EmptyControlCollection/VB/emptycontrolcollection.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用上面定义的空自定义控件。The following code example uses the empty custom control defined above. 如果运行此示例中，将会收到异常。When running this example, you will get an exception. 请注意，中显示的值`Register`指令反映在上述命令行。Notice that the values shown in the `Register` directive reflect the previous command line. ```vb <%@ Register TagPrefix="custom" Assembly="vb_myEmptyControlCollection" Namespace="CustomControls" %>

Using an Empty Control

``` ```csharp <%@ Register TagPrefix="custom" Assembly="cs_myEmptyControlCollection" Namespace="CustomControls" %>

Using an Empty Control

```

Public Overrides Sub Add (child As Control)

summary.span: 拒绝将指定的 对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Denies the addition of the specified object to the collection.

exception.span: 总是发出，原因是该控件不允许子控件。

span.span: Always issued, because the control does not allow child controls.

exception.span: 总是发出，原因是该控件不允许子控件。
